channel.title: Import/Export on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Import/Export on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Automation Framework Support
item.description: Automation Framework Support This add-on supports the Automation Framework. Job: import The import job allows you to import HAR(HTTP Archive File), ModSecurity2 Logs, ZAP Messages or a file containing URLs locally. - type: import # Import a file of requests parameters: type: # String: One of ['har', 'modsec2', 'url', 'zap_messages'] fileName: # String: Name of the file containing the data
